name: Ginger Fizzy

ingredients.name: lemon and orange slices, to taste (optional)

preparation:
1. Pour 4 cups boiling water over tea bags. Steep for 10 min. Remove tea bags and chill in refrigerator until cool, about 30 min.
  2. Mix tea, orange juice, sparkling water, and vinegar in pitcher. Top with lemon and oranges slices, if desired.
  3. Pour over ice in tall glasses.
tips: Use the 2-in-1 Citrus Press to squeeze your own orange juice.
